verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> upon Mahalath <WH4257>, Maschil <WH4905>, A Psalm of David <WH1732>. The fool <WH5036> hath said <WH559> in his heart <WH3820>, There is no God <WH430>. Corrupt <WH7843> are they, and have done abominable <WH8581> iniquity <WH5766>: there is none that doeth <WH6213> good <WH2896>.

God <WH430> looked down <WH8259> from heaven <WH8064> upon the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>, to see <WH7200> if there were <WH3426> any that did understand <WH7919>, that did seek <WH1875> God <WH430>.
Every one of them is gone back <WH5472>: they are altogether <WH3162> become filthy <WH444>; there is none that doeth <WH6213> good <WH2896>, no, not one <WH259>.
Have the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> no knowledge <WH3045>? who eat up <WH398> my people <WH5971> as they eat <WH398> bread <WH3899>: they have not called <WH7121> upon God <WH430>.

There were they in great <WH6343> fear <WH6342>, where no fear <WH6343> was: for God <WH430> hath scattered <WH6340> the bones <WH6106> of him that encampeth <WH2583> against thee: thou hast put them to shame <WH954>, because God <WH430> hath despised <WH3988> them.

Oh that <WH5414> the salvation <WH3444> of Israel <WH3478> were come out of Zion <WH6726>! When God <WH430> bringeth back <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of his people <WH5971>, Jacob <WH3290> shall rejoice <WH1523>, and Israel <WH3478> shall be glad <WH8055>.
